cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.16)
project(kivi)

set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 20)

include_directories(include)

add_executable(kivi
	main.cpp
	parser.cpp
	include/parser.hpp

	# Generated by `re2c`
	kivi_lexer.tab.cc

	# Generated by `bison`
	kivi_parser.tab.cc
	include/kivi_parser.tab.hh
	include/location.hh
	include/position.hh
	include/stack.hh

)
